articles.title: Posts
articles.contents:
<script>
        
      
          
        
        
             document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        
      
          
        
        
               if (!/posts/.test(location.pathname)) {
        
      
          
        
        
                 return;
        
      
          
        
        
               }
        
      
          
        
        
          
          
        
      
          
        
        
               var script = document.createElement("script");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.src = "https://giscus.app/client.js";
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-repo", "be-favorite/Distill");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-repo-id", "R_kgDOG6lkPQ");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-category", "Comments");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-category-id", "DIC_kwDOGZGr384B_-52");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-mapping", "pathname");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-reactions-enabled", "0");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-emit-metadata", "0");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-theme", "light");
        
      
          
        
        
               script.setAttribute("data-lang", “ko”);
        
      
          
        
        
          
          
        
      
          
        
        
               /* wait for article to load, append script to article element */
        
      
          
        
        
               var observer = new MutationObserver(function (mutations, observer) {
        
      
          
        
        
                 var article = document.querySelector("d-article");
        
      
          
        
        
                 if (article) {
        
      
          
        
        
                   observer.disconnect();
        
      
          
        
        
                   /* HACK: article scroll */
        
      
          
        
        
                   article.setAttribute("style", "overflow-y: hidden");
        
      
          
        
        
                   article.appendChild(script);
        
      
          
        
        
                 }
        
      
          
        
        
               });
        
      
          
        
        
          
          
        
      
          
        
        
               observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true });
        
      
          
        
        
             });
        
      
          
        
        
          </script>

articles.title: Taemo Bang
articles.contents:
Taemo Bang
          
          
          Home
          Blog
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Taemo Bang
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Facebook
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Main contents of this blog
            Statistics, Time Series, Statistical Learning, R
            
            Education
            Bachelor of Science in Statistics from Chungbuk National University
            Master of Science in Statistics from Chungbuk National University
            
            
            Current State
            Hi, I’m a data scientist and researcher at G-ABC, where I work on evaluating health effects from long-term exposure to air pollution, statistical consulting, and other projects.
            I fell in love with R and data science through my graduate research, using R and RStudio to wrangle, analyze, model, and visulize data. I became passionate about doing the R community and data science community, and involve in Tidyverse Korea as one of the managers, and write light articles in the sub-blog of the Youtube channel <Statistics Playbook> as one of the guest writers.
            One of my goals for this year 2022 was to get out of my Ex-blog using Tistory, which is a blog platform in South Korea, and start personal blogging using Distill. I plan to move my previous writings diligently and actively post new ones.
            Please excuse that all contents in my blog are written in Korean. If you have any questions about writings in my blog, please feel free to contact me through mail, Facebook, Twitter. I hope my blog helps you!
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Taemo Bang

              Education

              Master of Science in Statistics from Chungbuk National University
              
              
              Current State
              Hi, I’m a data scientist and researcher at G-ABC, where I work on evaluating health effects from long-term exposure to air pollution, statistical consulting, and other projects.
              I fell in love with R and data science through my graduate research, using R and RStudio to wrangle, analyze, model, and visulize data. I became passionate about doing the R community and data science community, and involve in Tidyverse Korea as one of the managers, and write light articles in the sub-blog of the Youtube channel <Statistics Playbook> as one of the guest writers.
              One of my goals for this year 2022 was to get out of my Ex-blog using Tistory, which is a blog platform in South Korea, and start personal blogging using Distill. I plan to move my previous writings diligently and actively post new ones.
              Please excuse that all contents in my blog are written in Korean. If you have any questions about writings in my blog, please feel free to contact me through mail, Facebook, Twitter. I hope my blog helps you!
